Element.Text: Zhuhai Maternal and Child Health Care Hospital
Electronic Gastroscope Diagnosis and Treatment Report
All inner atrioventricular diameter of the heart were within

range. The thickness of the wall was normal and the movement was coordinated. The diameter of the aortic root was normal and the amplitude of movement was normal. The valve structure of each group was well opened and closed. The diameter of the main pulmonary artery was normal.
No abnormal movement of ventricular wall.
Color Doppler examiniation result showed that the forward flow spectrum of the two or three cusp was normal during diastole: the E peak was larger than the A peak.
There was no abnormal blood flow in the aorta and pulmonary artery.

Element.Name: DESCRIPTION
Element.InnerValue:

The diameter of the main pulmonary artery was normal.
No abnormal movement of ventricular wall.
Color Doppler examiniation result showed that the forward flow spectrum of the two or three cusp was normal during diastole: the E peak was larger than the A peak.
There was no abnormal blood flow in the aorta and pulmonary artery.

Element.Text: No abnormalities were found in the cardiac structure and blood flow spectrum.

Element.Name: IMPRESSION
Element.InnerValue: No abnormalities were found in the cardiac structure and blood flow spectrum.

XTextDocument.BodyText:
Zhuhai Maternal and Child Health Care Hospital Electronic Gastroscope Diagnosis and Treatment Report TEL：0756-0000000 Date: 2012-06-29 10:16:00 No.: W-000000 Name: LiuXX Sex: M Age: 48 Equip: Inpatient ID: Bed No.: Depart.: TEL: 000000000 Clinical diagnosis: chronic gastritis Symptom: Type: Examination Result： All inner atrioventricular diameter of the heart were within normalrange. The thickness of the wall was normal and the movement was coordinated. The diameter of the aortic root was normal and the amplitude of movement was normal. The valve structure of each group was well opened and closed. The diameter of the main pulmonary artery was normal.
No abnormal movement of ventricular wall.
Color Doppler examiniation result showed that the forward flow spectrum of the two or three cusp was normal during diastole: the E peak was larger than the A peak.
There was no abnormal blood flow in the aorta and pulmonary artery.
Microscopy diagnosis: No abnormalities were found in the cardiac structure and blood flow spectrum. Pathology no: Test: Diagnosis: Pathology diagnosis: Anaesthesia: Check physician: Suggestions: Report Date:
